manifest.name: YouTube Tweak - Boost Your YouTube Experience
manifest.description: Packed with all the features you want: lock quality, speed buttons, show comments name and translate, hide distractions, and more.

checkbox.enable: Automatically switch to this quality when playback starts

tips.quality: If the selected quality is not available, the highest lower quality will be used.

checkbox.saveByChannel: Remember subtitle on/off status per channel

checkbox.hideCeElement: Translucent the recommended videos/authors at the end of videos
checkbox.progressEnable: Show the progress bar below the video
checkbox.progressEnableTag: Show the video time in the corner

checkbox.videoPerRow: Lock number of videos per row

tips.enable: Experimental feature (unstable). In some cases, you still need to click "Skip" additionally in the player, and it may be detected by YouTube.

checkbox.enableWatch: Block Shorts on video watch page

global.name: Global
global.description: This video can be viewed in all countries/regions.

family.name: Family Friendly
family.description: This video is suitable for all ages.

login.name: Login Required
login.description: Whether a login is required to watch this video.

blocked.name: Blocked
blocked.description: This video cannot be played due to issues such as copyright infringement.

r18.name: Age Restricted
r18.description: This video is for adults only.

kids.name: Kids Content
kids.description: This video is for children and cannot be commented on, watched in a mini player, or played in the background.

membership.name: Members Only
membership.description: This video is only available to paid channel members.

shorts.name: Allow Shorts
shorts.description: Allows this video to be used in YouTube Shorts.

embed.name: Embed
embed.description: Whether this video can be embedded on other sites.

crawlable.name: Unlisted
crawlable.description: This video can only be viewed by those with the link. It will not appear on the channel page and cannot be indexed by search engines.

private.name: Private
private.description: This video is only visible to the uploader or those invited by the uploader.

tips: The extension will automatically update after you close all YouTube tabs.
Click to check for updates now

alert.noUpdate: There is no new version yet
alert.unsupportedUpdate: Your browser does not support checking for updates, please visit the extension store to see if a new version is available.
alert.busy: Checking for updates too frequently, please try again later.

alert.resetConfig: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
alert.importError: Failed to import settings, please check the format.
alert.copyError: Failed to copy settings, please try again or use Ctrl+C.

modal.importTips: Paste the settings you want to import here
modal.exportTips: Copy the settings below to import them into another browser or share them with others.

installed.title: âœ… Extension successfully installed!
installed.line1: Thank you for installing this extension.
installed.line2: You can start using it by clicking the extension icon at the top right of your browser.
installed.line3: If you encounter any problems, feel free to report them on GitHub.
